title: rocknrolla title sequence
content:
could someone please identify the fonts used in the "rocknrolla" title and the "are you a rocknrolla" section? thanks in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420003006im_/http:/typophile.com/files/rocknrolla_xlg_6429.jpg)
author: wearedestroy

comments.content:
Can't find a perfect match. On other [posters](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420003006/http:/fc04.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2013/079/9/8/rocknrolla_poster __politically_corrected__ by_shauns13-d5n9574.jpg), they use [FF Water Tower](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420003006/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-watertower). Could be good base font mainly "squaring" external angles and filling the gaps.  
More clients for customization: [Rodchenko PT](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420003006/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/rodchenko-cond), [Grizzly Bear](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420003006/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/matchandkerosene/grizzly-bear) 3, [Kolega](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420003006/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/justmytype/kolega), [Teutonia](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420003006/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/teutonia), [Kremlin](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420003006/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/cheapprofonts/kremlin-pro)  
Ready-to-go options: [Chinese Rocks](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420003006/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/chinese-rocks), [Earthwerk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420003006/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/pizzadude/earthwerk) (not bad, "only" needing /A to be tweaked), [Bodywerk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420003006/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/pizzadude/bodywerk),
